name: CUBE ROYALE
description:
Play with Friends PVP PVE & Co-Op!



Unleash Your Strategic Prowess in a Multidimensional Battle Arena. Prepare for a thrilling and unpredictable journey into the world of Cube Royale, where strategy, cunning, and the element of surprise reign supreme. Engage in fierce multiplayer showdowns with up to 6 players in this turn-based, battle royale-style game.



Collect Protect Attack & Trap!



Be a hunter, collector, defender, and aggressor all at once! Every move you make opens up chances to score points, defeat rivals, set traps, or trigger chain reactions. Stay alive and gather the most points to win the match!



Use your Power-ups!



Power-ups give you advantages over your foes. Evaluate your options with every move. Use them strategically against your opponents and sweep them off the board.



Waves can destroy you!



Keep an eye out for the formidable waves that can potentially wipe out your CUBES. Yet, if used wisely, they can become a game-changing factor, bringing you one step closer to victory!



Accentuate your gameplay with more style!



Choose your very own CUBE from over 30 skins. Stand out from other players with your skill & style.



Secure your place in the global leaderboards!



Prove yourself and compete against the best players in the world. Secure your spot in the top 100!








For Local Multiplayer, each player needs an XBOX Controller!01. Start CUBE ROYALE.
02. Disconnect from the game server.
03. Hold down the A button on your XBOX controllers until the loading circle is closed.
